text: Vagner da Silva Sarti (born January 9, 1978) is a former Brazilian football player. ==Playing career== In 2001, Vagner joined Japanese J2 League club Ventforet Kofu, which had finished bottom two years in a row â€“ in 1999 and 2000. He debuted in J2 against Shonan Bellmare on March 17.J.League He could only play three matches, and left Ventforet in June.J.League ==Club statistics== |- |2001||Ventforet Kofu||J.
